name: hdsf-hive
description: The Harvest Interactive Visualization Engine (Hive) is a thin layer approach to wrapping d3 and optionally various renderers to produce a graph or chart in SVG, canvas, or WebGL.

scripts.cp: cp -ar src/schemes src/renderers src/meta src/popup.js src/SVGLoader.js dist
scripts.build:hive: browserify src/core.js src/plugins/* src/renderers/svg.js -p esmify -o dist/hdsf-hive.js --standalone mod
scripts.build:hivemin: browserify src/core.js src/plugins/* src/renderers/svg.js -p esmify --standalone mod | terser -mc -o dist/hdsf-hive.js
scripts.build: npm run build:hivemin && npm run build:flexmin && npm run cp

author: Michael Wolf
